title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 30
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 30
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Multi-Color (LABL). Multi-Color Corp.'s shares rose to a record after the label maker's fiscal fourth-quarter results were well received. Core earnings, excluding takeover-related costs and other items, beat analysts' highest estimate in a Bloomberg survey. Revenue topped the highest projection as well.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
